verbs.description: The number of undocumented immigrants without [ARG1: criminal convictions] [V: deported] [ARGM-DIR: from the U.S. interior] rose dramatically in Trump 's first year in office .
[ARG1: The number of undocumented immigrants without criminal convictions deported from the U.S. interior] [V: rose] [ARG2: dramatically] [ARGM-TMP: in Trump 's first year in office] .
